title: Multi-GPU with multi-scale Error
body:
Hello, multi-gpu without multi-scale works on 2x1080ti. But multi-gpu with multi-scale gives the following error:

`THCudaCheck FAIL file=/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1544199946412/work/aten/src/THC/generated/../THCTensorMathCompare.cuh line=82 error=59 : device-side assert triggered
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 210, in <module>
    multi_scale=opt.multi_scale,
  File "train.py", line 130, in train
    target_list = build_targets(model, targets, pred)
  File "/home/yolov3/utils/utils.py", line 301, in build_targets
    j = iou > 0.01
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (59) : device-side assert triggered at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1544199946412/work/aten/src/THC/generated/../THCTensorMathCompare.cuh:82
/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1544199946412/work/aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/IndexKernel.cu:53: lambda [](int)->auto::operator()(int)->auto: block: [0,0,0], thread: [6,0,0] Assertion `index >= -sizes[i] && index < sizes[i] && "index out of bounds"` failed.
/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1544199946412/work/aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/IndexKernel.cu:53: lambda [](int)->auto::operator()(int)->auto: block: [0,0,0], thread: [73,0,0] Assertion `index >= -sizes[i] && index < sizes[i] && "index out of bounds"` failed.
/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1544199946412/work/aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/IndexKernel.cu:53: lambda [](int)->auto::operator()(int)->auto: block: [0,0,0], thread: [36,0,0] Assertion `index >= -sizes[i] && index < sizes[i] && "index out of bounds"` failed.
/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1544199946412/work/aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/IndexKernel.cu:53: lambda [](int)->auto::operator()(int)->auto: block: [0,0,0], thread: [56,0,0] Assertion `index >= -sizes[i] && index < sizes[i] && "index out of bounds"` failed.
`

Thanks.
